items.sentence: Tom saw a herd of horses grazing peacefully in the distance.
Tom started playing the tuba when he was thirteen years old.
Tom took Mary to the hospital on the back of his motorcycle.
Tom found it difficult to make himself understood in French.
Tom must buy a pair of shoes. His old ones are all worn out.
Tom pulled out an old shoebox from his closet and opened it.
Tom and Mary have known each other since they were children.
Tom and Mary sat at the dining room table facing each other.
Tom and Mary seem to be afraid to kiss each other in public.
Tom and Mary went to a very expensive restaurant for dinner.
